title: Gold on blue
creator_credit: Cecil Holmes, Peter Johnson and Film Australia
brief_description: A look at the training and life-styles of the young men who enter “Cresswell”, the Royal Australian Naval College, near Nowra, N.S.W. Shows various aspects of the college from which they will graduate as junior officers.
creator_credit_for_label: Cecil Holmes, Peter Johnson and Film Australia
